dataset.max_pair_for_loading: the max number of pairs to be loaded, set -1 if there is no constraint,[max_train, max_val, max_test, max_debug]
dataset.load_training_data_into_memory: when train network, load all training sample into memory can relieve disk burden
dataset.spacing_to_refer: the physical spacing in numpy coordinate, only activate when using_physical_coord is true

tsk_set.batch_sz: batch sz (only for mermaid related method, otherwise set to 1)
tsk_set.check_best_model_period: save best performed model every # epoch
tsk_set.continue_train: for network training method, continue training the model loaded from model_path
tsk_set.continue_train_lr: learning rate for continuing to train
tsk_set.reset_train_epoch: allow the training epoch to be reset or not
tsk_set.load_model_but_train_from_epoch: if reset_train_epoch is true, the epoch will be set as the given number
tsk_set.criticUpdates: for network training method, the num determines gradient update every # iter
tsk_set.gpu_ids: the gpu id used for network methods

loss.type: the similarity measure type, support list: 'l1','mse','ncc','lncc'

tsk_set.max_batch_num_per_epoch: max batch number per epoch for train|val|test|debug
tsk_set.model_path: if continue_train, the model path should be given here
tsk_set.n_in_channel: for network training method, the color channel typically set to 1
tsk_set.method_name: MODEL: METHOD_NAME; mermaid_iter: affine, nonp; reg_net: affine_sym, mermaid; ants: affine, syn; niftyreg: affine, bspline; demons: demons
tsk_set.output_orginal_img_type: output follows the same sz and physical property of the original image (input by command line or txt)

affine_net.epoch_activate_extern_loss: epoch to activate the external loss which will replace the default ncc loss
affine_net.epoch_activate_sym_loss: the epoch to take symmetric loss into backward , only if epoch_activate_sym and epoch_activate_sym_loss
affine_net.lr_for_multi_step: if reset_lr_for_multi_step, reset learning rate into # when multi-step begins
affine_net.reset_lr_for_multi_step: if True, reset learning rate when multi-step begins
affine_net.using_complex_net: use complex version of affine net

mermaid_net.affine_init_path: the path of trained affined network
mermaid_net.affine_refine_step: the multi-step num in affine refinement
mermaid_net.epoch_list_fixed_momentum_network: list of epoch, fix the momentum network
mermaid_net.load_trained_affine_net: if true load_trained_affine_net; if false, the affine network is not initialized
mermaid_net.lr_for_multi_step: if reset_lr_for_multi_step, reset learning rate when multi-step begins
mermaid_net.mermaid_net_json_pth: the path for mermaid settings json
mermaid_net.optimize_momentum_network: if true, optimize the momentum network
mermaid_net.reset_lr_for_multi_step: if True, reset learning rate when multi-step begins
mermaid_net.using_affine_init: if ture, deploy an affine network before mermaid-net
mermaid_net.using_complex_net: using complex version of momentum generation network

tsk_set.warmming_up_epoch: warming up the model in the first # epoch
